name: Swarnakhi... 🌸!
greetingText: I really like your name btw 🐤 !
wishText: I hope your birthday is as fantastic as you are!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! hurry! Many many happy retuns of the day
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are not just birthday girl
outroText: Cheers to another year of wonderful adventures!
replayText: click, if you want to watch it again.
